annotations.description: We have seen a great game today, let's hope the players will be able to maintain these high levels of play in order to keep fans entertained in future games. We didn't see either team enjoy any significant control of the game. The home side were defending patiently to win the ball off the opponent and launch the counter. However, the away side moved the ball around and were waiting for a gap to appear in the home side's defence.
